result.execSummary:
The defendant Roger Shariko Russell was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Carry Concealed Weapon, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 941.23(2).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.descr: House of Correction - Imposed and Stayed

miscConds.notes: Provide a DNA sample. Pay a fine of $500.00 plus all mandatory costs, assessments, fine, surcharges including DNA, by 12-11-17. Any amount remaining due and owing is subject to civil judgment and/or tax intercept or other means.
UPON SUCCESSFUL COMPLETION OF THE SENTENCE COURT WILL ALLOW FOR EXPUNGEMENT.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Roger Shariko Russell

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.
Notice of court ordered financial obligations

records.addlTxt: Bail refund packet

Sentencing proceeded.  Statements by parties and the defendant.

The court sentenced the defendant to serve 90 days in the House of Correction, with credit for Zero days time served.  Huber privileges if revoked.
The court STAYED sentence and placed defendant on probation with the WI Department of Corrections for a period of 6 months.

CONDITIONS OF PROBATION:

-AODA and recommended treatment
-Obtain/maintain employment.
-Court ordered fine of $500
-Court ordered defendant to provide DNA sample 
-Pay all MANDATORY costs, assessments, fine, surcharges(including DNA), by 12-11-2017.  Any amount remaining due and owing is subject to civil judgment and/or tax intercept or other means. 
COURT ORDER ANY CASH BAIL ON DEPOSIT TO BE RETURN TO THE PERSON WHO POSTED THE BAIL.
Upon successful completion of the sentence Court will allow for expungement.

RECEIVED & FILED: Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief, letter from defense.

ADDRESS INFO for Roger Shariko Russell
Current: 4505 N 29th St Apt 203, Milwaukee, WI 53209 United States  (Effective: 12-09-2016)
Prior: 4505 N 29th St, Milwaukee, WI 53209 United States

Defendant Roger Shariko Russell in court with attorney Walter Arthur Piel.  May Y. Lee appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: LM  

Defendant changes his plea to GUILTY.  Defendant examined as to his plea, advised of his Constitutional rights and the maximum penalty.   Defendant advised that if not a United States Citizen, deportation is possible.  Court found that defendant knowingly, voluntarily and intelligently waived his rights.  Guilty Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum received and filed.  Parties stipulate to the complaint as a factual basis to sustain defendant's plea.  Court found defendant guilty and ordered a Judgment of Conviction be entered on the record.

Defendant Roger Shariko Russell in court with attorney Walter Arthur Piel.  Taylor L. Kraus appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: KAR.
Case calendared for plea and sentencing hearing.  For reasons stated on the record, defense requests an adjournment.  Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 31.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for December 19, 2016 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Roger Shariko Russell in court with attorney Walter Arthur Piel.  Taylor L. Kraus appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: LM  
Case in court for Plea/sentencing hearing, however defense requests more time.  Case remains calendared in Branch 31.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for November 2, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Roger Shariko Russell in court with attorney Walter Arthur Piel.  Taylor L. Kraus appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: KAR.
Case calendared for status conference.  Defense requests a plea and sentencing hearing date.  Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 31.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 30, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Roger Shariko Russell in court with attorney Walter Arthur Piel.  Taylor L. Kraus appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: KAR.
Case recalled.  Attorney Walter Piel has been retained by the defendant.  Defense requests status conference date.  Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 31.  Status conference scheduled for August 24, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Case calendared for scheduling conference.  Defendant requests that an attorney be appointed.  Case passed.

Attorney Danielle L. Shelton in court.  Sara Nicole Volden Schroeder appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a bench warrant to be issued.  State's motion for Judgment of Bond Forfeiture 30 days after notification from Clerk of Circuit Court's Office is granted by the Court.
Court ordered Defendant not to be in possession of any firearms or any dangerous weapons.

Defendant Roger Shariko Russell in court.  Ann R. Lopez appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant advised that this case is assigned to Judge Protasiewicz, Branch 24.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.   Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance.  Defendant IS Public Defender eligible.  Defendant is ordered to provide the public defender's office with the next court date.  The case is adjourned to Br. 24  for a Pretrial Conference.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 4, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant is Out-of-Custody. Court appearance in Out-Of-Custody Court, Room 221 Safety Building on 6/15/15 @ 1:30pm
